entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is part of the House-Elf Liberation Front. He has large ears and a st range collection of garments.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: A house-elf who is part of the House-Elf Liberation Front. She is not taking care of her clothes and has soup stains on her blouse.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story. He is offered a cup of tea by Dobby.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is present when Dobby offers him a cup of tea.

relationships.description: Dobby offered Harry a cup of tea.
Hermione tried to comfort Winky, but she cried harder than ever.
Dobby is a member of the House-Elf Liberation Front.
